creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: salmon pink background with yellow circular form ULQ; four-sided, irregular form with partial white fill, curving untinted form at L side of form; multiple layers of purples ad blue just LL of center with petal like offshoots; curving red line from R center to LL; yellow accent near center of red curve; large, indigo curving form at lower center; irregular oval impressed form at LRQ; half-oval salmon pink shape at LRC
signed: LLC, in pencil: [Corsage / Rikio Takahashi] LRC, in pencil: [1970]
title: Corsage
